newsitem.title: USA: Muni dealers traded $829 mln bonds Wednesday - MSRB.
newsitem.headline: Muni dealers traded $829 mln bonds Wednesday - MSRB.

text.p: Municipal bond dealers traded $829.2 million of bonds Wednesday on 4,252 trades, the Municipal Securities Rulemaking Board said.
A total of 2,503 individual issues changed hands, with 106 of those trading four or more times, MSRB said, citing figures from an automated clearance system of interdealer trades.
